ygData.subject: RE: [rest-discuss] HttpEvents as currently contemplated are extraneous?
ygData.msgSnippet: I think that persistent GET, http notifications, and http updates are complementary projects.  Hopefully people working on these can find *cough* synergies.

I think that persistent GET, http notifications, and http updates are
complementary projects.  Hopefully people working on these can find *cough*
synergies.
